Package unicam.cs.forza4

Class Forza4Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • unicam.cs.forza4.Forza4Server
  • public class Forza4Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Forza4Server represent the game server. It accepts connection from clients, communication mechanics and states synchronization.
